sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Product } from '../../models/product.model'; import { StoreService } from '../../services/store.service'; import { ProductsService } from '../../services/products.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-products', templateUrl: './products.component.html', styleUrls: ['./products.component.scss'] }) export class ProductsComponent implements OnInit { myShoppingCart: Product[] = []; total = 0; products: Product[] = []; constructor( private storeService: StoreService, private productsService: ProductsService ) { this.myShoppingCart = this.storeService.getShoppingCart(); } ngOnInit(): void { this.productsService.getAllProducts() .subscribe(data => { this.products = data; }); } onAddToShoppingCart(product: Product) { this.storeService.addProduct(product); this.total = this.storeService.getTotal(); } }
